@gchanan ,
I try to implement the code of gradient penalty caowang with multi-gpus, but the network occur the problem with

"RuntimeError : Scatter is not differentiable twice"

while add "torch.dataparallel()" to the Discriminator and Generator.
Followed by your suggestion of "gchanan"， the error changes to

"RuntimeError : arguments are located on different GPUs at /opt/conda/conda-bld/pytorch_1503966894950/work/torch/lib/THC/generated/../generic/THCTensorMathPointwise.cu:215"

How could I fix the problem? Thank you.

body:
@gchanan ,
I try to implement the code of gradient penalty [caowang](https://github.com/caogang/wgan-gp) with multi-gpus, but the network occur the problem with 

> "RuntimeError : Scatter is not differentiable twice"

 while add "torch.dataparallel()" to the Discriminator and Generator.
Followed by your suggestion of ["gchanan"](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/pull/2508/commits/53b7420e67c35793b938b010d78efa7bf55b5ad7)， the error changes to 

> "RuntimeError : arguments are located on different GPUs at /opt/conda/conda-bld/pytorch_1503966894950/work/torch/lib/THC/generated/../generic/THCTensorMathPointwise.cu:215"

How could I fix the problem? Thank you.
